File libsrc/libFK/FKCompute3C.c

Three-component power computation for an azimuth/incidence grid. The algorithm is from fk_3c_spectra.c, by Jeff Given.

Public Functions

FKCompute3C

                    CPlotData **cd_list,
                    int windowed,
                    double slowness_min,
                    double slowness_max,
                    int n_slowness,
                    double d_slowness,
                    int nbands,
                    double *f_min,
                    double *f_max,
                    FKFine *fine)
